# SQLite MCP Server v2.6.5

**Release Date:** January 13, 2026

## Overview

This release completes the migration to **Python 3.14**, bringing the latest Python runtime to SQLite MCP Server's Docker images and CI/CD pipeline.

## What's Changed

### Python 3.14 Upgrade
- Docker images now use `python:3.14-alpine` base
- CI matrix expanded to test Python 3.11, 3.12, 3.13, and 3.14
- All 73 tools verified working on Python 3.14

### Dependency Updates
- `mcp` minimum version: 1.23.1 → 1.25.0
- `starlette` minimum version: 0.50.0 → 0.51.0
- `pydantic-core`: 2.33.2 → 2.41.5 (Python 3.14 musllinux wheels)

### CI/CD Improvements
- Added GHA cache scope `py314` to prevent stale layer reuse during Python upgrades
- Added `.scout-ignore` for unfixable Alpine upstream CVEs (zlib, busybox)
- Updated Docker Scout scan to use `--ignore-file` flag

### Documentation
- Synchronized all wiki documentation dates
- Aligned tool category documentation with 10-group structure

## Upgrade Notes

No breaking changes. Docker users will automatically receive Python 3.14 when pulling `latest` or `v2.6.5` tags.

## Full Changelog

https://github.com/neverinfamous/sqlite-mcp-server/compare/v2.6.4...v2.6.5
